definition: not a sound to be heard (idiom)
a sound/a noise/musical pipe with 3 reeds
entirely/without exception/(literary) to be together/to be alike

sentences.english: My skin crawled when I heard a sudden shriek in the dead of night.
sentences.chinese: 夜晚萬籟俱寂時突然聽到一聲尖叫，嚇得我汗毛直豎。

sentences.english: Silence, silence, they can even hear the breath evenly.
sentences.chinese: 萬籟俱寂，靜的甚至可以聽見她們均勻的鼻息。

sentences.english: All nature was still, and the soft, mild air fanned her forehead.
sentences.chinese: 萬籟俱寂，柔和的微風吹拂她的前額。

sentences.english: The oasis was alive, yet everything was still.
sentences.chinese: 綠洲生機勃勃，然而萬籟俱寂。

sentences.english: I am in the morning bush, of Stranglethorn's jungle, green and lush.
sentences.chinese: 我是萬籟俱寂的晨，瀰漫於綠色茂盛的幽谷。

sentences.english: They ransacked the old lady's house in the dead of night.
sentences.chinese: 他們在夜晚萬籟俱寂時洗劫了這位老婦的住宅。

sentences.english: Everything was quiet, aside from the occasional sound of a car in the distance.
sentences.chinese: 萬籟俱寂，只有從遠處偶爾傳來汽車喇叭聲。

sentences.english: The world was green and silent.
sentences.chinese: 一片綠色的世界，萬籟俱寂。

definition: (of a city etc) ablaze with lights
nuée ardente/hot cloud of volcanic ash
talking in one's sleep/delirious ravings/nonsense/sheer fantasy
to talk in one's sleep/crazy talk
variant of 戰慄|战栗[zhan4 li4]
to fly up/to dance in the air (of snowflakes, flower petals etc)
